front.title: Extensions to IS-IS, OSPF, RSVP and CR-LDP for support of Diff-Serv-aware MPLS Traffic Engineering

abstract.t: A companion document [DIFF-TE-REQTS] defines the requirements for support of Diff-Serv-aware MPLS Traffic Engineering on a per-Class- Type basis, as discussed in the Traffic Engineering Working Group Framework document [TEWG-FW]. This document proposes corresponding extensions to OSPF, ISIS, RSVP and CR-LDP for support of Traffic Engineering on a per-Class-Type basis.
